doc.title: Filthy Rich
doc.plot: Palm Beachers raise the most money for charity in the world, sometimes throwing as many as 5 Galas per day. They raise money for Ireland, The Museum of Fashion History and The US Polo Team. With so much money being donated, you would think a homeless shelter in their backyard, on the verge of bankruptcy, would have no problem finding a socialite willing to champion their cause. Think again.
